name: Rich, Tart Lemon Sorbet
description: The title says it all: this is a smooth, sweet-tart sorbet that's perfect for summer. Or dinner.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup fresh juice from 6 lemons, chilled
1 1/2 cups water (preferably filtered or distilled bottled), chilled

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk all ingredients except salt together in a bowl until thoroughly combined. Add salt to taste. If water and lemon juice are not chilled, chill in refrigerator until cold.
Churn in ice cream machine according to manufacturer's instructions. Transfer to an airtight container and chill in freezer until firm, 2 to 3 hours.
